extendedInfo.description: Battery Saver will change the system ROM configuration for better battery life.NEW APPLICATION:If you love Performance Booster, RAM Booster, Internet Booster, and Battery Saver applications now build into one application. Four applications build into one application, the Pro Edition with some new functions. See more from developer (more by Gejos Enterprise) link to find the Pro Edition called Boosters Plus BatterySaver ProDISCLAIMER: It is made available for use at your own risk with no warranty of any kind.This application will not cut-off the mobile, wifi, etc connections while sleep, will not slow down the data connections, will not slow down the processors, etc. like other applications do, but this application will configure for the best battery settings in the system ROM for better battery life.Please note:in fact, it is hard to test in several minutes (for some reason)... you need to test for hours or day use to find out how it works.THIS APPLICATION IS FOR ROOTED DEVICE ONLYFind out what a ROOTED device is, see at the bottom of this description.Battery Saver needs root permissions. You need to allow the SuperUser privileges to run this application. Without the SuperUser privileges, this application cannot change battery configuration in system ROM. (got statistic from user emails that using SuperSU by chainfire never fail the SuperUser request). Why need root permissions? Because this application definitly NOT a placebo.If you love this application, please consider the donate version. see more from developer (more by Gejos Enterprise) link to find the donate version. Your donation will help to support my work. Thank you.This application is FREE and will always be FREE. Battery Saver 100% ads free. It's cost me US$25,00 for publishing this application to Google Play :)so please rate and review wisely, and please read this description first before rate and review. Thank you.If you don't know what a ROOTED device is, you can find a pretty good explanation here: [http://www.androidauthority.com/rooting-for-dummies-a-beginners-guide-to-root-your-android-phone-or-tablet-10915/]If your device not ROOTED, please do not give this application with low rating because of this application cannot run it on unroot devices. Thank you.If you love this application, please consider the donate version. see more from developer (more by Gejos Enterprise) link to find the donate version. Your donation will help to support my work. Thank you.***** the donate version is cheaper than hotdog :) give me five, 5 stars please, batterysaver, battery saver, battery, saver, batterybooster, battery booster, booster, gejos, gunawidjaja joseph, G. Joseph, G.JOSeph, GEJOS is my nickname, andro-id, andro-id.net, ultrajaya, campina, nikos, INDONESIA tanah air beta, I love INDONESIA *****

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: This app enhanced the performance and life of my sky vega racer\'s battery, this app works perfectly... Thank you!
reviews.author: Michael John

reviews.title: Why sorry is drain my battery FASTER?
reviews.comment: Yes I rooted my phone. I\'m Sure of that. Originally, it took 4 minutes for my phone to use 1%, now it\'s 1 min, 1%. Wth...

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I notice improvement of my battery.Especially,on standby mode.
reviews.author: King H

reviews.title: Great app..
reviews.comment: Light and easy..its totaly save my battery..more surf..play game texting..disable.enable 3G wifi automaticly..thanks dev..my advice before install (battery saver root) uninstall other battery saver app..WOW!!!! Xperia ZL..
reviews.author: KS Burn

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Note II GT-N7105
reviews.comment: This app rocks on my phone (rooted) look no further This is number one App It does what it says simple as that. Not only that but it will save on my battery life saving me even more money 5 stars thank you Dev & I have no problems with a donation it is well worth it  :-)
reviews.author: Field Royston

reviews.title: No idea
reviews.comment: I have no idea if this app and others you\'ve made are running. I just feel my battery drains slower and runs a lot faster now using your other apps (performance booster).  Hope you continue making good and free apps that are not bogus on their claims. Thanks
reviews.author: John Doe

reviews.title: How do you turn it on?
reviews.comment: How do you activate it? I checked the two checkmarks, but it never asked me for superuser permissions.  Update: I figured it out, you have to exit the program to start it.
